job description:
Posted Date: 9/17/2018
Job Category: Data Analyst
Position Title: Data Analyst - Jr

Salary Range:
Location: Los Angeles-Long Beach, California, USA

Desired Skills:
Description:
xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" xmlns:w="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word" xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2004/12/omml" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40">

Description:

Provide data architectural leadership in developing enterprise data/process models, and logical/physical database designs. Provide data and database development, maintenance, and production support. Participate in IT and Business project to define system requirements.

Experience Level: 0-3 Years.

Skill Set: Business analysis. Business process modeling - enterprise to department level. Ability to interpret Entity Relationship Diagrams.

Provides support for administering merit program as directed. Prepares statistical reports as directed. Calculates costs of current and proposed compensation programs. Analyzes data and develops recommendations for changes. Assists with compiling and computing data. Researches salary issues and compiles data upon request. Prepares and/or assists supervisors in preparing job descriptions. Minimum Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration or related area with specialization in HR and Labor Relations or equivalent experience required.

Relevant Years of Experience:

3-5 years of experience in Human Resources or Compensation or equivalent are required but in health care field preferred. Good general mathematics ability required. ? Excellent written and oral communication skills required.

Other Important Competencies:

1. Comfort around top management 2. Decision quality 3. Interpersonal Savvy 4. Listening 5. Business Acumen 6. Customer Focus 7. Negotiating 8. Career Ambition 9. Composure 10. Problem Solving 11.

Presentation Skills for success:

Analysis skills Effective communicator (Both oral and written) with all levels of Sr. leadership. Comfortable working with all levels Strong presentation skills Detail oriented Strong customer services Microsoft office suite - Intermediate user - Please provide test scores. Experience with Pivot tables Daily

Tasks:

Supporting the Compensation group Answering questions about the Compensation programs. Assist the Compensation group with developing documentation & training material that will be delivered via webex or in person Ensure compliance of performance documentation Assist with the role out of new web based application.
